ModuleDescription: The intent of the module is to enable students to apply the knowledge gained from academic studies to practical situations in the relevant local or foreign industry. There are also opportunities for students to be employed on funded research projects undertaken by staff members of the department Students who opt for this module are required to undergo nine (9) weeks of approved practical training at the end of the second semester in their Third Year of study. They are to submit a Log Book, an Interim Report, and an Academic Report for assessment.
